koreanStudy.title: Master Hangeul
koreanStudy.description: Learn Hangeul consonants and vowels step by step. You can click completed lessons to review.
koreanStudy.startDescription: From consonants and vowels to words, explore the beautiful world of Hangeul.
koreanStudy.readingDescription: Press the button to hear the native pronunciation.
koreanStudy.writingDescription: Watch the animation and trace the letter.
koreanStudy.speakingDescription: Press the microphone button and pronounce the letter.
